channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-19381] Function replication in cloud fail when download resource from AWS
item.description: Another case replication shall use the config in with clause.
item.summary: Function replication in cloud fail when download resource from AWS

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: daijy thejas Is this a blocker for 3.0 release? Or can it be deferred to next release?
Yes, this needs to go into 3.0 release. Always get lost in ptest. Kicking off again.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12921480/HIVE-19381.1.patch
